Package se.mau.DA343A.VT25.assignment1

Class AirQualityApp

java.lang.Object
se.mau.DA343A.VT25.assignment1.AirQualityApp
public abstract class AirQualityApp extends Object
SWING application simulating air quality.

  • Field Details

    • GRID_SIZE

      public static final int GRID_SIZE
      The grid size, represented in number of tiles (used for vertical and horizontal).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • AirQualityApp

      public AirQualityApp(String[] elementSelectorTypeNames, BufferedImage mapImage)
      Constructor for the app.
      Parameters:
      elementSelectorTypeNames - labels for the combo box.
      mapImage - the map background image.

  • Method Details

    • startGUIOnNewThread

      public final void startGUIOnNewThread()
      Launch the GUI. This method starts the Event Dispatch Thread, using SwingUtilities.invokeLater(..). (Subsequent work should be done on that thread.)

    • repaint

      public final void repaint()
      Update/refresh the GUI, for example when the set of elements, their positions, or the pollution values has changed. (Only needs to be called once to update the GUI, even if lots of things have changed)

    • getSelectedElementType

      public final String getSelectedElementType()
      Gets the currently selected value in the combo box.
      Returns:
      a string representing the currently selected type.

    • setPollution

      public final void setPollution(int row, int col, double airPollution)
      Set the air pollution value for a square in the grid. Remember to call repaint() to update the map in the GUI.
      Parameters:
      row - row (zero indexed)
      col - (zero indexed)
      airPollution - A value not less than zero. Values greater than 100 are shown like 100.

    • mouseClicked

      protected abstract void mouseClicked(int row, int col)
      Invoked when the mouse is clicked within the grid.
      Parameters:
      row - row for the click.
      col - col for the click.

    • buttonNextTimeStepClicked

      protected abstract void buttonNextTimeStepClicked()
      Invoked when the button is clicked to execute the next simulation timestep.

    • elementIconsToPaint

      protected abstract List elementIconsToPaint()
      Should return the current list of all the ElementIcons. Invoked during painting.

    • onStarted

      protected void onStarted()
      Invoked when the GUI is started.

    • getAlphaForPollution

      protected int getAlphaForPollution(double pollution)
      Compute the alpha (transparency) channel value for a given pollution.
      Returns:
      value between 0 (transparent) and 255 (100% opaque).
